title: HEXinASCII_TO_BYTE (Function)
text:
FUNCTION HEXinASCII_TO_BYTE : BYTE
Converts one word in HEX code representing its ASCII value into one byte of binary code
The higher byte in the input represents the higher bits in the output.
Use
BYTE_TO_HEXinASCII
function for the reverse conversion.

rows.Name: HEXinASCII_TO_BYTE
rows.Comment: Value in binary code of the inputW
